com.paydiant.android.core.domain.loyalty.AccrualActivity

  • Packages that use AccrualActivity 
    Package Description
    com.paydiant.android.core.domain.loyalty
    This package contains domain objects which are used with the loyalty management operations.
    com.paydiant.android.core.facade
    Contains the core facade service implementations.
    com.paydiant.android.ui.service.loyalty
    UI services and listener implementations for loyalty management operations.
